languages.text: Помедлив, техномат добавил — раньше эти сервиторы работали исправно, и причину их изменившегося поведения никто не в силах объяснить. Наблюдая за оцепеневшими, но подающими признаки жизни полулюдьми-полумашинами, Лорд-капитан...

traits.locale_text: Помедлив, техномат добавил — раньше эти сервиторы работали исправно, и причину их изменившегося поведения никто не в силах объяснить. Наблюдая за оцепеневшими, но подающими признаки жизни полулюдьми-полумашинами, Лорд-капитан...

languages.text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...
languages.original_text: Помедлив, техномат добавил — раньше эти сервиторы работали исправно, и причину их изменившегося поведения никто не в силах объяснить. Наблюдая за оцепеневшими, но подающими признаки жизни полулюдьми-полумашинами, Лорд-капитан...

traits.locale_text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

languages.text: しばらくの沈黙の後、テクノマットはサーヴィターが以前正常に機能していたこと、そして誰も彼らの行動の変化を説明できなかったことを付け加えた。{mf|彼|彼女}の関心は依然として動かないが生命力を帯びた半機械半人間の存在に向けられ、ロード・キャプテンは….
languages.original_text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

traits.locale_text: しばらくの沈黙の後、テクノマットはサーヴィターが以前正常に機能していたこと、そして誰も彼らの行動の変化を説明できなかったことを付け加えた。{mf|彼|彼女}の関心は依然として動かないが生命力を帯びた半機械半人間の存在に向けられ、ロード・キャプテンは….

languages.text: Après avoir marqué une pause, le technomate ajouta qu'avant cela, les servitors fonctionnaient correctement et que personne n'avait pu expliquer leur changement de comportement. Le regard encore posé sur ces êtres à la fois humains et mécaniques, immobiles mais animés, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}...
languages.original_text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

traits.locale_text: Après avoir marqué une pause, le technomate ajouta qu'avant cela, les servitors fonctionnaient correctement et que personne n'avait pu expliquer leur changement de comportement. Le regard encore posé sur ces êtres à la fois humains et mécaniques, immobiles mais animés, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}...

languages.text: 技工顿了顿，补充说那些机仆以前都是正常的，没人明白他们究竟为什么会发生这样的变化。舰长大人的目光依然注视着那些一动不动、但却有了生命的半机械人，决定……
languages.original_text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

traits.locale_text: 技工顿了顿，补充说那些奴工以前都是正常的，没人明白他们究竟为什么会发生这样的变化。舰长大人的目光依然注视着那些一动不动、但却有了生命的半机械人，决定……

languages.text: Tras una pausa, el tecnómata decidió que los servidores funcionaban correctamente y que nadie podría explicar el cambio en su comportamiento. Con la mirada aún fija en las criaturas mitad hombre mitad máquina, inmóviles pero vivas, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...
languages.original_text: After a pause, the technomat added that the servitors used to function properly and that no one had been able to explain the change in their behaviour. {mf|His|Her} gaze still trained on the motionless but animate half-machines and half-people, the Lord Captain...

traits.locale_text: Tras una pausa, el tecnómata decidió que los servidores funcionaban correctamente y que nadie podría explicar el cambio en su comportamiento. Con la mirada aún fija en las criaturas mitad hombre mitad máquina, inmóviles pero vivas, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...

languages.text: Nach einer Pause ergänzte der Technomat, dass die Servitoren bisher ordnungsgemäß funktioniert hatten und sich niemand ihr verändertes Verhalten erklären konnte. Der Lord Captain hatte den Blick noch immer auf die reglosen, aber beseelten Halbmaschinen und Halbmenschen gerichtet und ...

languages.text: Teknomat, bir müddet duraksadıktan sonra hizmetörlerin o güne dek gerektiği gibi çalıştığını ve davranışlarındaki değişimi kimsenin açıklayamadığını ekledi. Hareketsiz fakat bilinçli yarı makine, yarı insan hizmetörlerden bakışlarını ayırmayan Lord Kaptan...
